mapper.insert: INSERT INTO favorites (user_id, output_id, created_at) VALUES (#{userId}, #{outputId}, NOW())
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM favorites WHERE user_id = #{userId} AND output_id = #{outputId}
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM favorites WHERE user_id = #{userId} AND output_id = #{outputId}

SELECT o.id, o.user_id, o.category_id, o.title, o.summary, o.detail, o.icon, o.video_url, o.created_at, o.updated_at FROM favorites f JOIN outputs o ON o.id = f.output_id WHERE f.user_id = #{param1} ORDER BY o.created_at DESC
